name: Grabbing Style
text: You are adept at the one-handed grab.
prerequisites: Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +6, brawler’s flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature.
benefit: When you use this style, you do not take a –4 penalty on combat maneuver checks to grapple a foe with only one hand. Additionally, you do not lose your Dexterity bonus to AC while pinning an opponent.
normal: Without two hands free, you take a –4 penalty on the combat maneuver roll to grapple a foe. While pinning a foe, you lose your Dexterity bonus to AC.
staminaText: When you make a grapple attempt with two hands while using this style, you can spend 1 stamina point to gain a +2 bonus on the grapple combat maneuver check.
text_zh: 你磨练自己挟制敌人的技巧，单手即可将对方抓牢。
prerequisites_zh: 精通擒抱，BAB+6或拳师连打职业能力或疾风连击职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你使用擒拿手流派时，你在仅用单手擒抱目标的战技攻击检定上不再承受-4减值。除此之外，你在压制（Pinning）一个敌人时不再会失去防御等级上的敏捷加值。
normal_zh: 如果你不能空出两只手来进行擒抱，你在擒抱目标的战技攻击检定上会承受-4减值。你在压制一个敌人时会失去防御等级上的敏捷加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你在使用这个流派使用两只手做出擒抱尝试时，你可以消耗1点耐力来在擒抱战技检定上获得+2加值。
